In Chile, a billionaire president pushes austerity while the military represses protesters. Thousands have been arrested. Knowing Chile's history, this is very dangerous.
 
The solution here and across the world is obvious. Put power where it belongs: with working people. https://twitter.com/ajplus/status/1189000147075829760 …

✅ Prohibit school lunch programs from denying children hot meals
✅ Wipe out existing delinquent meal debt and stop harassment of families
